    • appendBasePredicate

      public EntityQueryFilterConfiguration.EntityQueryFilterConfigurationBuilder appendBasePredicate(String eql)
      Append a predicate to the base EntityQuery predicate. If no previous predicate has been configured, this method behaves the same as basePredicate(EntityQuery). If a previous predicate has been added, the new predicate will be added to it.

      If the new predicate defines a sort value, it will replace the previously configured sort.

      Parameters:
      eql - representing the predicate
      Returns:
      current builder

    • appendBasePredicate

      public EntityQueryFilterConfiguration.EntityQueryFilterConfigurationBuilder appendBasePredicate(EntityQuery basePredicate)
      Append a predicate to the base EntityQuery predicate. If no previous predicate has been configured, this method behaves the same as basePredicate(EntityQuery). If a previous predicate has been added, the new predicate will be added to it.

      If the new predicate defines a sort value, it will replace the previously configured sort.

      Parameters:
      eql - representing the predicate
      Returns:
      current builder

      Parameters:
      propertyNames - in a property selector format
      Returns:
